txt.en: Defeated a member of the Sorcerer's Council ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Easterlings have established a dangerous organization under the watch of the Sorcerer, making them a more deadly foe than ever. The council of the Sorcerer should be destroyed.
The Easterlings have established a dangerous organization under the watch of the Sorcerer, making them a more deadly foe than ever. The council of the Sorcerer should be destroyed.
The Sorcerer's Council resides in five towers throughout the large encampment of Jóshkhin Orda to the north of North-torr.\n\nYou should defeat each of the members of the Sorcerer's Council.

'I am grateful to you, [placeholder]. That council oversaw the Easterling battle strategy and were at the head of all enemy movements in the Wold.\n\n'There are likely many more to come from the Undeep, but this will surely slow them down. This was no small victory! My own soldiers would be hard-pressed to execute such a bold plan.'
The Sorcerer's Council resides in five towers throughout the large encampment of Jóshkhin Orda to the north of North-torr.\n\nYou should defeat each of the members of the Sorcerer's Council.
Sergeant Guthferth stands guard at North-torr, just north of the city of Floodwend in the Wold.\n\nYou should speak with Guthferth.
Enter the Easterling encampment of Jóshkhin Orda
Defeat a member of the Sorcerer's Council ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
